## type [Clock](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/adapters/outbound/reaction/zoom/executor.go#L52-L54>)

Clock abstracts time retrieval for deterministic tests

```go
type Clock interface {
    Now() time.Time
}
```

## type [HTTPClient](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/adapters/outbound/reaction/zoom/executor.go#L47-L49>)

HTTPClient models the subset of http.Client used by the executor

```go
type HTTPClient interface {
    Do(req *http.Request) (*http.Response, error)
}
```
